name: Winterpelt Conversationalist
description: Reach 100 skill in the Winterpelt language. Allows you to chat in Winterpelt!
criteria: Achieve rank 100 in the Winterpelt language.

name: Treasures of The Waking Shores
description: Discover the hidden treasures within the Waking Shores.

name: Hunt Master
description: Complete every Grand Hunt in the Dragon Isles.

name: Who's a Good Bakar?
description: Pet all of the bakar in the Ohn'ahran Plains.

name: Treasures of the Ohn'ahran Plains
description: Discover the hidden treasures within the Ohn'ahran Plains.

name: Taking From Nature
description: Unlock 5 different fishing nets in Tuskarr Fishing Holes.

name: Treasures of The Azure Span
description: Discover the hidden treasures within the Azure Span.

name: Siege on Dragonbane Keep: Chiseled Record
description: In Dragonbane Keep, find all of the djaradin tablets.

name: I'm Playing All Sides
description: Ensure that you always come out on top by turning in Obsidian Keys to each of these individuals at the Obsidian Citadel.

name: Obsidian Keymaster
description: Turn in a total of 30 Obsidian Keys to individuals around the Obsidian Citadel.

name: Obsidian Champion
description: Complete the following special encounters at the Obsidian Citadel and adjacent lava fields.

name: Treasures of Thaldraszus
description: Discover the hidden treasures within Thaldraszus.

name: Chronograde Connoisseur
description: Defeat all Fractured Causalities in a variety of different realities during Time Rifts.

name: Minute Menagerie
description: Obtain a variety of pets from alternate timeways by completing Time Rifts.

name: Lock and Load
description: Fire a variety of weapons found in Time Rifts.

name: Thunderstorms in The Waking Shores
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental air during a storm event in The Waking Shores.
criteria: Defeat air imbued creatures within the Waking Shores.

name: Sandstorms in The Waking Shores
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental earth during a storm event in The Waking Shores.
criteria: Defeat earth imbued creatures within the Waking Shores.

name: Firestorms in The Waking Shores
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental fire during a storm event in The Waking Shores.
criteria: Defeat fire imbued creatures within the Waking Shores.

name: Snowstorms in The Waking Shores
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental water during a storm event in The Waking Shores.
criteria: Defeat water imbued creatures within the Waking Shores.

name: Sandstorms in the Ohn'ahran Plains
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental earth during a storm event in the Ohn'ahran Plains.

name: Snowstorms in the Ohn'ahran Plains
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental water during a storm event in the Ohn'ahran Plains.

name: Thunderstorms in The Azure Span
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental air during a storm event in The Azure Span.

name: Sandstorms in The Azure Span
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental earth during a storm event in The Azure Span.

name: Firestorms in The Azure Span
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental fire during a storm event in The Azure Span.

name: Snowstorms in The Azure Span
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental water during a storm event in The Azure Span.

name: Thunderstorms in Thaldraszus
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental air during a storm event in Thaldraszus.

name: Sandstorms in Thaldraszus
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental earth during a storm event in Thaldraszus.

name: Firestorms in Thaldraszus
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental fire during a storm event in Thaldraszus.

name: Snowstorms in Thaldraszus
description: Defeat creatures empowered with elemental water during a storm event in Thaldraszus.

name: Nothing Stops the Research
description: Defeat the Sundered Flame leader Captain Reykal during either of the Researchers Under Fire events.

name: Through the Ashes and Flames
description: Complete the quest "Suffusion Camp".

name: Treasures of the Forbidden Reach
description: Discover the hidden treasures within the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

name: Hoarder of the Forbidden Reach
description: Open 100 small treasures around the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

name: Champion of the Forbidden Reach
description: Complete all of the following special encounters in the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

name: Forbidden Spoils
description: Open 10 Forbidden Hoards around the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

name: Librarian of the Reach
description: Collect each of the following books found in the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

name: Scroll Hunter
description: Find treasures from 50 Sealed Scroll maps in the post-storm Forbidden Reach.

name: Under the Weather
description: Complete a Froststone Vault Primal Storm of every element.

name: While We Were Sleeping
description: Deliver the following items to the Scalecommanders at the Forbidden Reach.
